com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.wizards
Class ClassChooserPage

java.lang.Object
  WizardPage
      com.sap.furcas.ide.projectwizard.wizards.ClassChooserPage

public class ClassChooserPage
extends WizardPage

This page lets the user choose one or more natures to add to the DSL Project.

createControl

public void createControl(Composite parent)
Creates the UI of the page. The main element is the search Tree. It consists of a Searchfield and a treeviewer.

setTreeInput

public void setTreeInput(java.lang.Object object)
Sets the contents of the treeviewer to the contents of the metamodel chosen on the LoadPage.

Parameters:
object - The object the TreeViewers input is set to.
